TopicTitle: My modded ksp client will always eventually crash, just like other games in my steam library.

Articles.Content:
Hello, as the title says my modded KSP client will always crash eventually after an undefined and random amount of time but crashes more frequently the longer the thread/client has been active for.

All Logs - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Mb4Qr6ELyVYe3dCK_8q_yrkgBUd7svfz/view?usp=sharing
Hello bro! I have a solution for solving ksp crashes as well as other Unity engine games, and that is to remove "UnityCrashHandler64.exe which will most likely solve your problem
